job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pData Scientistpp ppThis position is expected to carry out sophisticated operations to analyze model and build predictions based on organized disordered data ppbrppHe or she will work closely with leaders in Data Analytics and Engineering to work with statistical programming machine learning and artificial intelligence methods to help our client understand their members clients and operations with precision ppbrppThey should therefore be capable of complex and creative problem solving with the ability to complete difficult projects that fulfill our clients outcomesbased mission ppbrppThe ability to coalesce multiple sometimes divergent data sets to fulfill the visualization and analysis of an outcome mortality readmissions eg is required ppbrppCreative solutions are encouraged and immersive experiences preferredpp pp  Primary skills for this position include those requisites for developing products that use data to enable analyses information delivery and interaction with users Successful candidates should have a good understanding of a statistical programming language consistent with data science and machine learning including Python or R Our team includes a mix of R or Pythonpp pp  Knowledge of information architecture as defined in the field of design as well as the field of data architecture is preferred to enable the candidate to construct analyses with complex data sets when data engineering resources are unavailableppbrppstronguRequirementsustrongppbrppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspMinimum Bachelors Computer Science Business Statistics Information Sciences Healthcare Design EngineeringppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspPreferred Masters in Public Health Computer Science Informatics Analytics Statistics Engineering BiostatisticsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspHealthcare experience preferred but not requiredppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspDemonstrable skill with R or Python in a data science environment is requiredppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspDemonstrable skill building models with an appropriate understanding of results and an ability to monitor model performance over time is essentialppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspAbility to work with data science teams to assist in delivery of analytical outcomes and modelsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspAbility to perform analysis of clinical data with stakeholders and users to deliver actionable insightsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspAbility to design and develop classical statistical and advanced machine learning modelsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspExperience with supervised and unsupervised model developmentppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspAbility to generate a quality work product in a timely manner while maintaining a strong attention to detailppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspWork closely with end users to design impactful analyses with a variety of methodologiesppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspStrong communication skills to enable the developer to interview users and enhance the user experienceppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspIdentify and communicate operational impact of analytical findingsdecision supportppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspSupport other members of the team with the ability to explain methodologies and assist in developmentppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspBe a strong learner with the understanding of continuous professional and technical improvement of skills and techniquesp
